name: SEO Validation
description: Validate SEO assets, metadata, content optimization, and backlink quality

then.prompt:
Validate SEO implementation:
1. Check SEO asset structure and completeness
2. Verify metadata fields (title, description, keywords)
3. Analyze content optimization (headings, keywords, readability)
4. Review internal linking structure
5. Check backlink quality and relevance
6. Validate schema markup if present

Provide specific recommendations for improvement.
